task_text: Well, high-value bogie anti-corrosion system for FerroRail needs stronger capability in Quality management systems. Who would be the best internal expert outside of the project to consult?

projects.name: HV anti-corrosion system for rail bogies

text_blocks: Found the project. Now let me get its details to see the current team, then find QMS experts outside the project.

project.name: HV anti-corrosion system for rail bogies
project.description: Development and validation of a high-value anti-corrosion coating system for rail bogies.

text_blocks:
I found the project and many QMS experts. The current team members are:
- iv5n_042 (Lead)
- iv5n_025 (Engineer)
- iv5n_123 (QA)
- iv5n_060 (Ops)

I need to find the best QMS expert who is NOT on the project team. The top expert is **Marco Bianchi (iv5n_001)** with QMS level 10 - the highest possible. He's not on the project team.

Let me also verify iv5n_060 (Viola Messina) is on the team - she is (Ops role), so we need to exclude her from recommendations.

input.message:
For the **HV anti-corrosion system for rail bogies** project (FerroRail), the best internal expert to consult for Quality Management Systems (QMS) capability would be:

**Marco Bianchi** - QMS skill level: 10/10 (exceptional)

Marco is in Corporate Leadership at HQ Italy and has the highest QMS expertise in the company. He's not currently on the project team, making him an ideal external consultant.

**Current project team:** The project already has Viola Messina (level 7 QMS) in an Ops role, but Marco's exceptional expertise (level 10) would provide a significant boost to the team's QMS capability.

Note: I excluded Viola Messina from recommendations since she's already assigned to this project.
